channel.title: Comments on: Next TechLudd in Limerick on Thursday 21st Feb

item.title: By: Anton Mannering
item.dc:creator: Anton Mannering
item.description: Thanks for the mention. Actually only some details are on my blog. The full event details and registration are on the website http://techludd.com/ And any further details or announcements are on the TechLudd blog http://www.techludd.com/blog Hope to seee you there.
item.content:encoded:
Thanks for the mention. Actually only some details are on my blog.
The full event details and registration are on the website http://techludd.com/
And any further details or announcements are on the TechLudd blog http://www.techludd.com/blog
Hope to seee you there.
